projects.job: Register domain name and publish dummy screen on the Internet
userStories: As user, I can see @snigo's portfolio on https://snigo.dev
As @snigo, I can build and deploy by pushing to master on https://github.com/snigo/snigo-dev
As browser, I can see favicon, basic website description

added: Initial setup of typescript and sass environment for Next.js
Continuous integration / deployment from github repository

projects.job: Automate changelog, make a proper day task card and fix responsiveness
userStories: As user, I can use website on every modern device and screen size
As user, I can see daily task, user stories and change log, as well as technologies used
As user, I can go to each day's release and compare logs from website, as well as from CHANGELOG.md on github
As @snigo, I never have to change both relative and absolute dates on the chellenge
